job-frontend-001.title: Senior Frontend Developer
job-frontend-001.description:
Own the web experience for our financial platform.
Collaborate with design, product, and backend teams to deliver delightful user journeys.
Ship high-quality React and TypeScript components with strong accessibility.

job-marketing-002.title: Growth Marketing Manager
job-marketing-002.description:
Develop and execute multi-channel acquisition campaigns.
Analyze funnel performance and optimize for CAC and LTV targets.
Partner with product marketing to craft compelling narratives.

job-product-003.title: Product Designer
job-product-003.description:
Design end-to-end experiences for climate tech applications.
Conduct user research, produce prototypes, and iterate quickly.
Collaborate with engineers to ensure high-quality implementation.

job-data-004.title: Data Scientist
job-data-004.description:
Build predictive models that power customer insights.
Work alongside data engineers to productionize pipelines.
Communicate findings clearly with stakeholders across the business.

job-ops-005.title: Operations Lead
job-ops-005.description:
Own day-to-day operations and cross-functional coordination.
Design scalable processes supporting our nationwide expansions.
Champion operational excellence across teams.

job-sales-006.title: Enterprise Account Executive
job-sales-006.description:
Own the full-cycle sales process for mid-market accounts.
Collaborate with product teams to shape tailored demos.
Meet and exceed quarterly revenue targets while nurturing long-term relationships.

job-support-007.title: Customer Success Specialist
job-support-007.description:
Guide new customers through onboarding and activation.
Resolve support tickets with empathy and clear communication.
Surface product feedback to help improve our user experience.

job-finance-008.title: Finance Manager
job-finance-008.description:
Lead financial planning and analysis for a growing fintech startup.
Build models that inform strategic decisions and investor reporting.
Partner with department leads to manage budgets and forecast growth.

job-ai-009.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job-ai-009.description:
Design and deploy ML models that power predictive analytics.
Collaborate with data engineers to productionize scalable pipelines.
Monitor model performance and iterate based on real-world feedback.

job-people-010.title: People Operations Coordinator
job-people-010.description:
Support hiring, onboarding, and culture initiatives across distributed teams.
Maintain employee records and coordinate benefits administration.
Assist with planning community events and internal communications.
